|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;E3930;x5-E3930; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = X86 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz <!-- 1.3-1.8 GHz doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDINBDG4-16G; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25U6473FM2I-10G; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SODIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = ADATA;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |eth4chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 7C:5A:1C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ-45,, USB Female Micro-B,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, power switch, metal case, heat sink |addchip = LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6791D;;1;,,, 5V RS-232 Transceiver;MaxLinear;SP213E;;1;,,, USB Full Speed to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT234XD;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,, Dual D-Type Flip-Flop w/Set and Reset;NXP;74LVC74AD;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;2;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel HexFET Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4435DY;;1;,,, Transient Voltage Suppressing Device;Amazing Micro;AZ3028-04P;;8;,,, 16V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter w/ Adjustable Current Limit;MPS;MPQ8633A;;1;,,, Dual Output 3&2 Phase Controller w/ Single Intel Proprietary Interface;ON Semi;NCP81243;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel Enhancement Mode Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6921GMT;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- CB-6912 --> |manuf_rev = <!-- REV A0 --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 03/31/2025 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAA7WDZJ4471 |asin = B07S211TRT |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-E3930 :Dual-Core 2C2T (@1.3GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB Quad SPI Flash, :16GB SanDisk eMMC *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sophos/sophos_xg_86_rev_1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
